We appreciate your interest in Texas Roadhouse, and we want to do everything we can to make sure you have an amazing time when you come by for a visit. We’ll be happy to respond to any question or provide any information that will answer your needs. Our Customer Hotline is available from Mondays to Sundays, from 10AM to 8PM. The Bistro Group Head Office Address 9727 The Bistro Group, Kamagong Street, San Antonio Village, Makati City 1203 Metro Manila ‎ Our Customer Hotline is available from Mondays to Sundays, from 10AM to 8PM. Mobile Number: 09175245058 Landline Number: 8662 2523 Email Address: ask@bistro.com.ph Contact form Name Email * Phone number Comment By submitting this form, I have read, understood and agreed to the Texas Roadhouse's Privacy Policy .
